data.title: Magic Bullet and Personal Blender Injury Claims
data.meta_description: Free Consultation - Call (800) 337-7755 - Jason Turchin helps victims and their families receive compensation for their injuries in Product Liability and Injury cases. Magic Bullet and Personal Blender Injury Claims - Miami Product Liability Lawyer
data.text:
Eating healthy shouldnât be dangerous to you or your family. If you were injured by a Magic Bullet, you may have a claim for personal injury entitling you to money for your pain and suffering, medical treatment and more. Our personal injury lawyers can handle claims against most personal blender brands. If you were injured by a personal blender, call the product liability attorneys at the Law Offices of Jason Turchin today for a free consultation at 800-337-7755.

If you were injured by a broken or defective personal blender like the Magic Bullet, you may be entitled to compensation to cover your pain and suffering, past and future medical treatment, lost wages and more. Our product liability attorneys can handle cases where someone was injured by a Magic Bullet personal blender. If you need a Magic Bullet attorney because you were injured by a personal blender, call us today. We can represent many people injured by personal blenders, and can handle claims against most major companies, including Magic Bullet, NutriBullet, Hamilton Beach, and more.

Contact one of our magic bullet injury lawyers now if you were injured by a personal blender to find out if you are entitled to compensation at 800-337-7755.

Magic Bullet and NutriBullet Injury Claims

If you were injured by a Magic Bullet personal blender, you may be able to file a lawsuit in Florida or where the incident happened. Call us for a free consultation if you were hurt by any of these devices:

NutriBullet Blender Model Number NB-201

NutriBullet Blender Model Number NB-101

Baby Bullet, Magic Bullet, Magic Bullet Mini, NutriBullet Lean, NutriBullet Max, NutriBullet 1200, NutriBullet Balance, NutriBullet Rx, NutriBullet Select, NutriBullet Sport, Veggie Bullet, NutriBullet University Pro, Party Bullet

Magic Bullet

Magic Bullet Complaints

There have been numerous complaints with Magic Bullet Personal Blenders already. Hereâs what Amazon users are saying:

âI bought my Magic Bullet to make baby food for my daughter. I was using the steamer lid to blend sweet potatoes and when I went to remove the lid, it exploded! I still have scars from the second-degree burns.â

âI made myself a protein shake this morning, and the blender exploded! The cup and blades separated I ended up with protein shake all over my kitchen.â

âI used my Nutribullet to make breakfast for my grandson. When I poured out the food, there were black specks mixed in. It turned out to be bits of the plastic base from where the blades inside had started to break down the plastic.â

Common Magic Bullet Claims may include:

Burns & Cuts â Magic Bullet personal blenders have been known to explode, especially when used to blend hot foods, causing potentially severe burns and cuts to the thighs, genitals, hands, and even face. These burn injuries could require skin grafting, antibiotics, and could even lead to infection.

Scars and Skin Discoloration â Severe burns could cause the victimâs skin to become permanently discolored, or even leave scars. These injuries could require revision surgery or future medical care.

Property Damage â When food inside a personal blender explodes, it could cause property damage. Magic Bullet personal blenders can cause property damage to your home and belongings, including your furniture.

Wrongful Death â If burn injuries lead to infection, the victim could even die from the injuries. This would lead to a possible wrongful death case.

Call us for a free Magic Bullet injury lawyer consultation!

At the Law Offices of Jason Turchin, we fight for safer products. If there is a personal blender causing injury to customers, we want to hold the manufacturer responsible and fight to get the victims the money they deserve.

Victims may be entitled to compensation for:

Past pain and suffering

Future pain and suffering

Past medical expenses

Future medical expenses

Lost wages

Loss of earning capacity

Household services

Punitive damages

Property damage

and more

We look forward to speaking with you to see if you have a Magic Bullet injury case. We work on a contingency fee, which means we donât get paid any money unless you get compensated.

Contact our firm now or call 800-337-7755. Itâs a free consultation!

At the Law Offices of Jason Turchin and through our network of nationwide product liability attorneys, our Magic Bullet injury attorneys can represent you in Florida, and throughout the United States if you were injured by a personal blender.
